group_1.narration: Back then, I was fighting against the@Witches of Kamihama City alone.
As I said at the beginning,@I didn't think I needed any friends...
At the time, my first impression of her was that@she was just a lost stray from Takarazaki Cityâ€•@Someone not strong enough to survive in Kamihama.
I thought I would never see her again.
But she appeared in front of me once more.
Apparently, she thought that Uwasa were the cause of her sister's@disappearance, and ended up finding me while researching them.
Before I knew it, the three of us found ourselves investigating@the [textBlue:Rumor] of Mizuna Shrine, Tsuruno included.
There was a [textBlue:Rumor] going around about the Shrine,@saying you could see the person you most wished to meet.
True to that tale, I met Mifuyu,@a former comrade I had once fought alongside.
For me, who had been searching tirelessly to engrave@the reality of losing her into my heart, the shock of@seeing her appear in front of me was overwhelming.
However, the Mifuyu I believed I had finally managed to meet@was nothing more than an illusion created by the Uwasa...
In striking down with my own hands the illusion of Mifuyu whom@I had been searching for, my Soul Gem became clouded.
After seeing my state, Iroha chose to use her Grief Seed@on me despite how painful it must have been for her@to meet the illusion of her little sister.
As a consequence, Iroha's Soul Gem became completely corrupted.
But she manifested something called a Doppel,@which defies the fate of Magical Girls.
...Once again, I blamed myself for putting@those around me in danger...
Reflecting on it now, if I had explained more about@Doppels back then, perhaps things wouldn't have@turned out the way they did.
